para.para.body: What is \rk(\Mtrx{A}) ?
Find a basis for the row space V of \Mtrx{A} .
A basis for V consists of the nonzero rows of the RREF of \Mtrx{A} . Therefore a basis for V is \EuScript{B} := \Set{ (1,0),(0,1) } .
What is the dimension of V ?
The dimension of V is the number of vectors in any one of its bases. We found earlier that V has a basis with two vectors. Thus \dim(V) = 2 .
